heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy, with any stray flurries or isolated snow showers north ending.  Some sunny intervals midday and afternoon.  Milder.  Highs in the 30s to near 40.  Winds light, becoming south near 10 mph.

heading: Presidents Day
text: Mostly cloudy, with any stray flurries or isolated snow showers north ending.  Some sunny intervals midday and afternoon.  Milder.  Highs in the 30s to near 40.  Winds light, becoming south near 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Becoming mostly cloudy.   A few snow showers developing through NY, spreading east, mainly north of Rt. 4.  Lows in the 20s to near 30.  Light south winds, diminishing overnight.

heading: Tuesday
text: Mostly cloudy, with a chance of a morning snow showers.  Lots of clouds, and limited breaks of sun midday and afternoon.  Mild.  Highs in the upper 30s and low 40s.  Winds southwest 5 to 15 mph.
